definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Fireflies fly everywhere on summer nights, which attract children to chase after them.
sentences.chinese: 夏日的夜晚，流螢飛舞，惹得孩子們爭着抓撲。

sentences.english: Just because life is as short as the fireflies, human must cherish lives themselves.
sentences.chinese: 惟其人生如流螢般的短促，人類才更加珍惜生命自身。

sentences.english: Small skirt light fan fireflies flutter.
Sword only still whether stream Ying, easily drift breathed eastwards the shoulder sting of square brocade go.
sentences.chinese: 劍光猶若流螢，輕飄無聲的往東方錦的肩膀刺去。

sentences.english: Rain falling on a summer night is also lovely.
sentences.chinese: 飛着流螢的夜晚連下雨也有意思。

definition: to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
Milky Way/also called 銀河|银河[Yin2 he2]
soughing/whistling or rushing sound (of the wind in trees, the sea etc)
